videos.title: Short Film - Introspection
videos.description: I write... but I don't know exactly why. I cross out, I tear up, I continue. Somewhere between uncertainty and freedom, each word is a reflection of my thoughts. An intimate, dark and cinematic video.

videos.title: PICTION at BIG (BPI Event)
videos.description: PICTION at #BIG, the Bpifrance event! Video recap of this major innovation event.

videos.title: PICTION - NBM Sécurité
videos.description: Meeting with NBM Sécurité, a company specializing in security and home renovation. Coverage of the new premises inauguration.

videos.title: Interview - TU COMMENCES DEMAIN
videos.description: Meeting with Charles, co-founder and CEO of TU COMMENCES DEMAIN. Interview to discover his journey and company.

videos.title: Interview - Esprit Zen
videos.description: Meeting with Esprit Zen, Japanese garden creator. Discovering the profession of garden creation and its different aspects.

videos.title: Interview - Le Comptoir de Mathilde
videos.description: Meeting with Le Comptoir de Mathilde. Interview to discover the different aspects of this passionate profession.
